    Hand.getCard(int damage)
    Get the card that does the specified damage (or next greater) with the least energy used.
    Card
    Deck.getRandomCard()
    Uses a random number generator to get a card from the deck somewhere then swaps the last card in the deck to that position and reduces the cardsRemaining by one.

    Get the highest value card from the hand.
